details.script_description: This script trains a MobileNet model on the TinyImageNet dataset. It uses TensorFlow 2.10.1-foss-2022a-CUDA-11.7.0 and a virtual environment to manage dependencies. The script copies source code and datasets to local scratch for better performance, creates symlinks to logs and checkpoints, and installs necessary packages using pip. Finally, it runs the training script with specified parameters. The training script saves the trained model to a specified location.
